GmDescription: A cloying fish-scented liquid, anyone wishing to take this concoction must first pass an Average (+20) Cool test. This done, the drinker receives 1 @Condition[Fatigued] condition, which can only be removed after a good night’s rest. The potion offers no other effect. However, it tastes so bad von Holzenauer’s customers remain convinced of its efficacy to cure almost any malaise.
